title: Research scenario set Unit 5 - score distribution

content.question: If the researchers graphed the results of the stress survey, which of the following statements would be the best prediction about the distribution of scores?

choices.label: The distribution of scores would likely appear as a normal distribution.
The distribution of scores would likely be skewed toward high stress.
The distribution of scores would be skewed toward low levels of stress.
The distribution of scores would be negative.

content.answer: The distribution of scores would likely be skewed toward high stress.

skill.text: 3.B: Calculate and interpret measures of central tendency, variation, and percentile rank in a given data set.
